Feedback

We are determined to enhance the Alliances digital experience for all of the partners, researchers, and students of UCL Computer Science alike. Please let us know how might we improve the user experience for you.

Feedback via Git Hub

Have you got a Git Hub account? Are you comfortable opening a new issue in our site repository? If yes, please do. All feedback is welcome through Git Hub issues.

Feedback via E-mail

Prefer a simple e-mail? Please send suggestions to cs.strategicalliancesteam@ucl.ac.uk.
